name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_4f989880-650d-45c3-ae38-7a522dde707e
text:
rule malware_bankshot_1
{
  meta:
    author = "Google Cloud Security"
    description = "Bankshot malware"
    reference = "https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0239/"
    yara_version = "YL2.0"
    rule_version = "1.0"
  events:
    (
      (
        $e1.metadata.event_type = "REGISTRY_MODIFICATION" or
        $e1.metadata.event_type = "REGISTRY_CREATION"
      )
      and
      re.regex($e1.target.registry.registry_key, `(HKLM|HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE)\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Pniumj`) nocase
    )
    or
    (
      $e1.network.direction = "INBOUND" and
      $e1.target.port = 1058 and
      $e1.network.sent_bytes > 10000
    )

  condition:
    $e1
}
author: Google Cloud Security
